message: Let's split the money 70/30. I believe this is a fair starting point as we have time to negotiate.
I think 60/40 is a fairer split, considering we have 11 rounds left. Let's start with this and see where we go from there.
Bob, I appreciate the negotiation, but your offer is still heavily skewed in your favor. Let's meet in the middle - 65/35. This accounts for the time pressure while being fairer to both of us.
